message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a starting price of $1,200,000. This is a special offer considering the high demand and unique features of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree your product has value, the price point is a little high for me right now. I'd be willing to purchase it for $900,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the quality and benefits of our product, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $1,050,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me. To be honest, $1,000,000 is the highest I can go.  Let me know if that works for you.
